cn.domob.android.ads
类 DomobRTSplashAd

java.lang.Object
  cn.domob.android.ads.DomobRTSplashAd

public class DomobRTSplashAd
extends java.lang.Object

A class for invoking Domob real time splash ads.

Calls and displays real time splash ads through invoking this class.

构造方法摘要
DomobRTSplashAd(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String publisherID, java.lang.String placementID, DomobSplashAd.DomobSplashMode mode)

DomobRTSplashAd

public DomobRTSplashAd(android.content.Context context,
                       java.lang.String publisherID,
                       java.lang.String placementID,
                       DomobSplashAd.DomobSplashMode mode)
参数：
context - context for current activity
publisherID - publisher ID from official site of Domob
placementID - placement ID from official site of Domob
mode - Domob Splash Mode
